title: Vernal N-E Dark Spot Corrector Cream - Clinically Proven - Visibly Reduce And Fade Dark Spots, Age Spots & Traces of Past Acne Scars.
description:
Reveal flawless, spotless skin with Vernal N-E Spot CorrectorTM, a technologically advanced formula that not only helps prevent future skin spots production, but also helps reduce the formation of cellular debris that causes age spots. Stop dark spots before they start while fading the ones you already have!
Dermatologist proven to be safe and comfortable. In consumer trials this cream was comparable to a leading prescription ingredient in visibly reducing dark spots-a verified 58 percent improvement at 8 weeks. Recommended for all skintones, you will see results in as little as four weeks, with a visible reduction in age spots and acne scars.Lightweight and versatile, this layering cream is also appropriate for the backs of hands and chest.What else you need to know:This formula is appropriate for all skin types-even sensitive skin that may not tolerate other treatments. For optimal results, follow with a moisturizer and a daily, broad-spectrum sunscreen.Research results:In consumer trials after 12 weeks of treatment:- 63% improvement in skintone- 88% reduction in dark spots-100% reported improvement in skin's clarity-100% reported that their skin looks healthier & refreshedOUR GUARANTEE- Made in USA- FDA. GMP. Certified Facilities- 100% Pure and Natural Ingredients

title: Cellulite Dissolving, Fluid Reducing Aromatherapy Dead Sea Bath Salts - "Skinny Bath" - With Natural, Organic Ingredients. You'll LOVE This! Money Back Guarantee EXTENDED For 1 Year!
description: The days of shedding excess weight in the bathtub are back!Do you think enjoying a moment of pampering while toning your body is only possible at the spa?Think again!With"Skinny Bath" Fluid Reducing Cellulite Dissolving Aromatherapy Bath Saltsyou can indulge in wonderful aromatherapy at home while watching inches just melt away.Our signature combination of aromatic dead sea salts infused with a select blend of essential oils, aid in reduction of water weight, bloating, and stagnant lymphatic fluid.Emerge from your tub feeling lighter, more invigorated, and with hydrated supple skin.
